meanings.definition: A bar on a typewriter that carries a typeface and strikes the paper to form a character.
meanings.sent1: The typebar on the old typewriter made a satisfying click when pressed.
meanings.sent2: Make sure the typebar is aligned properly before typing on the typewriter.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat loved to play with the typebar, pretending to be a writer.
meanings.sent4: Her words hit the page like a typebar striking a fresh sheet of paper.
meanings.sent5: The typebar, with its intricate design, left a lasting impression on the document.

meanings.definition: A bar on a keyboard that carries a typeface and is pressed to input a character.
meanings.sent1: Press the typebar gently to input the letter 'A' on the keyboard.
meanings.sent2: The typebar on the digital keyboard is much quieter compared to the typewriter.
meanings.sent3: The tired office worker dreamt of a magical typebar that could type on its own.
meanings.sent4: Her fingers danced across the typebar, composing a beautiful symphony of words.
meanings.sent5: The glowing typebar beckoned her to start typing, promising a world of possibilities.
